text:
Can you read my files?


I don't see any files shared in our conversation yet. While I can help analyze various file types (text, images, code, etc.) when they're shared, you'll need to actually upload or share the files you'd like me to look at. Once you do, I'll be happy to help examine them.
/file *

Read this?


I cannot directly access files on your computer or execute file system commands. I can only read files that you explicitly share/upload to our conversation. If you'd like me to help with some files, you'll need to share them directly in our /filchat. What kind of files were you hoping to have me look at?
/file Bober-HQ/main.py
summary: I don't see any files shared in our conversation that I could read or analyze. If you'd like me to help you summarize something, you'll need to share the content with me first. I can help create a title once I have the text to work with.
